name: Duck Adventure (prototype)
description:
Duck Game

All original digital art

Not sure what to do with this exactly. I was thinking of making a rogue-like where you find different armor and weapons along your way to defeating ... idk another duck maybe? 

There's a training dummy to attack and some slime enemies but they just sit there :(

Controls - Mouse + Keyboard

Move: W, A, S, D

Attack: Left-Mouse Button

Weapon Ability: Right-Mouse Button

Aim: Mouse

Show Stats: Tab

Pickup/Interact: Space

Quack: Q

Reset Game: R

Three weapons/classes

  • Sword & Shield / Tank, Warrior
    • Hold Right-Mouse to Block 
  • Magic Wand / Mage
    • NOTE: RIGHT NOW I'm split on the wand's ability. One wand has 'Teleport' the other has 'Barrier'. 
  • Dual Daggers / Rogue
    • Click Right-Mouse to Dash 

Feedback welcome!
